description:
Update: Spicy Dice now comes with 5 groups of 3 dice to customize in the edit section, allowing you to have spicy dice for 5 different occasions. 

So add some spice to your life with this sexy and fun party game. Perfect for adventurous couples or for breaking the ice. The dice come with default sides but you can delete them and/or add AS MANY of your own personal choices to make it less or more spicy. You have the option of using 2 or 3 word dice or regular number dice. So it's like getting two apps in one! Even though they appear as six-sided dice, you can add as many choices to each of the 3 dice and the app will use them all. Just "shake" the dice or click "GO" and you will hear and watch the dice roll. You can disable the sound effects and/or shaking options in the preferences. All your preferences are saved for the next time you use the app again. You even have a history to look back and reminisce on the fun you had.
